topic.title: hi all
topic.body: Is Usenet still useful in 2019? I want to explore this network.. thanks

1562866332_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: The Internet is faster without all these websites ;)

People of Europe think that nations behind each event like this one are from the East (Russia, China ...) . They can't think by themselves, these idiots. 
They are less and less smart...
